title: Power Asymmetry Management Strategies for Team Learning Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and team project experience
context.additional_context: Team learning strategies for professionals, focusing on field-applicable methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of intra-team power structures on learning efficiency
Learners can design at least three strategies to promote egalitarian interactions within teams under environmental pressures
Learners can present team learning improvement plans leveraging power asymmetry in project formats

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
